DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to compare the safety, effectiveness and immunogenicity of FKB327 in comparison to Humira® in rheumatoid arthritis patients who have completed study FKB327-002 and have inadequate disease control on methotrexate.
DOC.brief_title: A Study to Compare FKB327 Long-term Safety, Efficacy and Immunogenicity With Humira® in Rheumatoid Arthritis Patients
DOC.criteria: 1. Patient has completed the Week 24 visit procedures of Study FKB327002 and are continuing with methotrexate 2. In the investigator's opinion, the patient showed a clinical response to treatment during Study FKB327002 1. Patient has evidence of a serious adverse event (SAE) ongoing from Study FKB327002 2. Patient has presence of active and/or untreated latent tuberculosis (TB) Other Inclusion/Exclusion criteria may apply.
